column4: including Chinese nationals (*source headline suggests all
column6: have been sworn in as Khmer nationals after the King has given a royal decree to prepare the oath before the Supreme Court.------The swearing-in ceremony took

column1: place at the Supreme Court of the Kingdom of Cambodia on the afternoon of July

column3: presided over by Dr. Chiv Keng
column4: President of the Council of Swearing

column1: and Vice-President of the Supreme Court.------The 11 are now officially Khmer citizens from today.------Cambo Press
